lines.text: Good morning, everyone. I hope I'm going to be able to help you all with any problems you might have by showing you exactly how I go about my daily skin care, myself.
Remember, I said, stimulation is the basis of my skin treatment.

[Sitting in a bubble bath]
Though its only necessary for you to leave your mask on for as long as it takes to take a bath, some girls wait until evening to take a bath. So, those girls can leave their masks on while they're preparing breakfast! Or, even while they're drinking their morning coffee. Just between us, I've done that very thing when I've tried to steal a few more minutes of sleep in the morning.
This is very important to all of us women. Because the only time that we're not on parade is the time we spend in front of our dressing tables and sometimes not even then.
Remember, that to be beautiful and natural is the birthright of every woman.
So, now, goodbye and I wish you all loads and loads of loveliness and good luck.
